segments.text: In this line drawing of the kitchen, details pop out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: First, the overflowing sink catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet, filling and spilling over the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing a plate, towel bunched in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the wet floor touching her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window, showing a tidy garden beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A path winds through low plants to a distant fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy perches on the unstable stool by the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches to dip into the labeled cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand clutches a plate, perhaps as a shield.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him reaches up, expectant and excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret operation adds a fun twist to the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the tipping stool and slippery puddle spell trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damages the lower cabinets as it streams down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This everyday setting hides so many risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
